column2: M is the largest three digit number which when divided by 6 and 5 leaves remainder 5 and 3 respectively. What will be the remainder when M is divided by 11?

let that number be ‘M’
⇒ M/6 = 5 (remainder)
M could be 5, 11, 17, 23, 29, ...
⇒ M/5 = 3 (remainder)

The largest three digit number comes when K is 32
⇒ 30 (32) + 23 = 983
∴ When 983 is divided by 11, leaves the remainder 4.

column2: Average of all even numbers between 222 and 250 is _________.

⇒ Average of all even numbers between 222 and 250 = (13 × 236)/13
∴ Average of all even numbers between 222 and 250 = 236
